content:
Hey everyone, trying to make my first contribution here #21000. I'm currently working on making the avatar on the profile section responsive. I have managed to come up with this changes, would love some feedbacks.

Previously,
unresponsive_profile.gif

Changes,
responsive_profile.gif
@Tim Abbott could you look at this please?

@Sayam Samal please keep in mind that it's normal for it to take some time for your PR to be reviewed; there is no need to ping Tim Abbott or myself here. (See also https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/overview/contributing.html#common-questions for what to do if you've been waiting for a while.)

Alya Abbott said:

Sayam Samal please keep in mind that it's normal for it to take some time for your PR to be reviewed; there is no need to ping Tim Abbott or myself here. (See also https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/overview/contributing.html#common-questions for what to do if you've been waiting for a while.)

Noted, I'll wait for it to be reviewed organically.
